INSERT INTO COMMERCE_ITEM (ORDER_ID, REFERENCE_ID, `NAME`, QUALITY, LIST_PRICE, SALE_PRICE, QUANTITY, AMOUNT, SNAPSHOT_ID, `INDEX`, MERCHANT, CREATION_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, `TYPE`) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{referenceId}, #{name}, #{quality}, #{listPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{quantity}, #{amount}, #{snapshotId}, #{index}, #{merchant}, now(), now(), #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT ci.commerce_item_id, ci.order_id, ci.reference_id, ci.name, ci.quality, prod.list_price, prod.sale_price, ci.quantity, ci.amount, ci.snapshot_id, ci.`index`, ci.merchant, ci.creation_date, ci.update_date, m.media_id, m.title, m.path FROM COMMERCE_ITEM ci LEFT JOIN PRODUCT prod ON ci.reference_id = prod.product_id LEFT JOIN MEDIA m ON ci.snapshot_id = m.media_id WHERE ci.order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY ci.index
